title: Account merge
body:
Hello
I'd like to ask if there will be any way to merge two accounts together at any point, because as for me I've always had two accounts: EUNE and EUW. I used two accounts because friends played on West and East servers, which forced me to have both accounts to play with all of them when needed. Now having two accounts I keep switching them if I want to play specific champion or role. Would there ever be a chance to merge two old accounts? One of them is back from when there was one EU server and second after they got seperated. There might be people needing that function also.
Cheers

replies.body:
Since I'm not on the team that works on these features, I can't tell you whether or not this could be a thing. If you'd like, you can submit this question to [**Ask Riot**](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where we field questions from the community and have some of the members from our development teams hop in to answer.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
I've asked the question in Ask Riot (Chose EUW) and there hasn't been any reply in the last 3, almost 4 days. What's up with that? How long do I have to wait?

Not all questions asked in **Ask Riot** are answered there. You can find our official announcement and more information about Ask Riot in [**this post**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/its-your-turn-ask-riot).

If you have any other questions, let me know.
